title: Enunakkinnum
sahitya:
Enunakkinnum irakkamillai ivvEzhaiDam iraivA shiridum


anupallavi

  dIna parAdhInan dayAnidhi tirumayilai padivaLar kapAlI


caraNam    muDivilAk-kaDal naDuvil shikkuNDu muvAshai kayirkkaLAl kaTTuNDu
 mOdum kavalai nOigaLAl mottuNDu muraiyO muraiyO enru kadarum aDimaiyiDam
